Seven Canaries.name: Seven Canaries
Seven Canaries.flavor: Seven yellow canaries blink into existence about you, each one embodying a different blessing from Bahamut.
Seven Canaries.effect: Seven canaries appear and fly about you, remaining until the end of the encounter or until expended. You gain the following benefits.
Seven Canaries.special: As an immediate interrupt when an attack hits you, you can expend one canary (and one of the above benefits) to gain a +4 power bonus to defenses against that attack.

Dragon Bite.name: Dragon Bite
Dragon Bite.flavor: You rend your enemy with a crushing bite.
keywords: Melee 2  Target: One creature  Attack: Level + 8 vs. AC  Hit: 3d12 + 12 damage, and the target slides 1 square.
Dragon Bite.onHit: 3d12 + 12 damage, and the target slides 1 square.

Breath Weapon.name: Breath Weapon
Breath Weapon.flavor: You open your draconic maw to release a gout of bitter cold.
Breath Weapon.onHit: 4d12 + 10 modifier cold damage, push the target 3 squares, and the target is immobilized (save ends).
Breath Weapon.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is pushed 1 square.
Breath Weapon.effect: After the attack, you resume your normal form.
